Engineer with 7 years of experience in Sales/Customer Service,
I have a Master’s in Logistics obtained at Pontificia Universidad

of development.

Logistics Supply Chain Specialist
enero de 2021 - febrero de 2022 (1 año 2 meses)
Chile
• Respond to customers with a sense of urgency to provide an
excellent customer experience
• Perform outreach activities including cold calls, e-mails, LinkedIn
communication, conference calls, and video meetings with prospects
and existing customers.
• Understand and present pricing proposals and presentations to
potential customers.
• Manage the sales process and customer information in Cargo Wise
System.
• Target and successfully achieve sales goals and Key Performance
Indicators (KPIs) as defined by management.
• Develop understanding of organizational structure, service offerings,
and be able to identify which department, service, and solution best
fits a customer’s need
• Collaborate with, support and respond to internal teams and
departments with customer related needs and issues related to
pricing, accounting, legal, claims, operations, etc.
• Coordinate shipments with exporters, truckers, and carriers.
• Prepare billing package, bill file, email/mail to clients.
ECU Worldwide
Inside Sales Specialist
enero de 2017 - diciembre de 2021 (5 años)
Page 1 of 2
Chile
●Manage the team towards achieving quarterly and annual targets.
● Maintain client relations to build excellent reputation for service
and produce repeat business.
● Analyze market needs, develop account strategies and convey to
chief responsible personnel.
● Propose new products to clients using entire data sources to
prepare and conduct optimum presentations.
● Increase accounts revenue and identify fresh business
opportunities adhering to a given budget structure.
● Identify account distribution and resolve void issues.
● Interact regularly with top ten accounts related to monthly volume.
